ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Conveyors
ResearchProjectDef.description: First introduction to conveyor belts and fueling machines.\nThis will get you started with moving stuff around.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Item Sorting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Item Sorting will unlock a simple puller growzone puller and a splitter for normal belts.
